-- Lynxiz --

Lynxiz shrugs off the rubble that was covering her. She looks around 
at the damaged Maximal base as she receives the commlink from the 
unknown bot. She replies quickly, "Wha? Why? What happened?" The 
last part mostly to herself, she was confused by why the base was so 
severly damaged... what could have been so powerful... It was beyond 
her comprehension. Shaking her head, her warrior instincts kick in. 
She crouches, and looks for enemies, attempting to ensure that her 
position was safe.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "hotgy69420" <Hottie4u2have1@a...> wrote:
> Lynxiz this is Panthro come to our base. thank you.Ohh yeah i have
